title: Stars As Lights - As If Time Had Stopped (2013)
description:
Artist: Stars As Lights
Album: As If Time Had Stopped
Year: 2013 (1st June)
Genre: Post-rock, Ambient
Composer: Lauri Paavolainen
Quality: 128kbps MP3

After a long pause in composing, I took my day offs and rested my ears from the overstrain that I had caused by forcing myself to compose music. I realized the fact that it isn't about building your song library to brag about, it's about expressing yourself through music, putting feeling into the airwaves that one calls music. 

The album goes through my memories and takes little bits and pieces from everywhere, binding them all together and distorting them a little. It's a nice little trip inside my thoughts.
